General.Name: Vapores
General.Description: Compañía Sud Americana de Vapores S.A. operates as a shipping company. The company engages in the container shipping business. It operates a fleet of 237 container vessels with a portfolio of 122 services in 129 countries. The company was founded in 1864 and is based in Las Condes, Chile. Compañía Sud Americana de Vapores S.A. is a subsidiary of Quiñenco S.A.
